name: Marinated Potato Salad with Anchovy Vinaigrette
author: wahine
summary: This is a delicious potato salad that includes sausage, olives and many other zesty flavors.  It's great to serve at a summer picnic lunch or barbecue.
ingredients: 6 ounces black olives, pitted and halved
directions: In a blender, combine the oil, vinegar, parsley, salt, sugar, anchovy fillets and garlic
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes
Drain, cool and cut into cubes
Pour prepared vinaigrette over potatoes and marinate overnight
Place sausage in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Combine the potatoes and dressing, sausage, green onions, parsley and olives
Toss together well and season with salt and pepper to taste
